title: Flight Exec logo font
content:
A friend of mine would like to politely ask you if you could id this font. It’s not cute so I obviously have no idea :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FE Logo plain.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203144952/http:/typophile.com/files/FE%20Logo%20plain.jpg) | 5.27 KB |

 [‹ Tuscan-style numbers on t-shirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203144952/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39047 "Go to previous forum topic") [A little help please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203144952/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39215 "Go to next forum topic")
author: HaleyFiege

comments.content: First Part/FLIGHT is ITC Bauhaus Heavy [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/heavy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203144952/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/heavy/)
EXE could be from Bauhaus 93 [http://www.identifont.com/show?1MU](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203144952/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1MU) and the capital C is probably a modified E?
